name_en: Wavy Hair + Ribbon + Face & Hair Decor
name_ru: Волнистые волосы + Лента + Декор на волосах и лице
name_ka: ტალღოვანი თმა + ლენტი + დეკორი თმასა და სახეზე
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all features, expression unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. SKIN: Remove minor blemishes, natural texture, slightly dewy. [SKIN_TAN]. HAIR: Make wavy, preserve original color. Add [DECOR_IN_HAIR] randomly in hair for a realistic look. OUTFIT: Change to reveal exposed collarbone. Tie a thin [RIBBON_COLOR] ribbon around the neck. BACKGROUND: Solid beautiful black. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus. Original dimensions.
